settings.learnDataProtection: Learn how your data is collected, used, and protected.
settings.seeDataUsageDetails: See in detail which of your data is used and how.
settings.downloadAllPersonalData: Download and check all your personal data in JSON format.
settings.startWithQuickSteps: Start with quick steps, find quick answers with FAQ.
settings.diaryInstructions: Press the "Write Today" button on the main page, write your feelings and thoughts.
settings.dreamVsGoal: What is the difference between Dream and Goal?
settings.dreamVsGoalAnswer: Dream is vision, goal is measurable step. Goals progress with milestones.
settings.promisesAnswer: Simple commitments you make to yourself. Increases confidence as you complete them.
settings.howToSetupNotifications: How do I set up notifications?
settings.notificationsAnswer: Manage morning/evening, silent hours and summary options from Settings > Notifications.
settings.themeChangeAnswer: You can change it instantly via Settings > Theme Selection.
settings.milestoneAnswer: Sub-tasks within goals. Percentage automatically increases as you mark them, mini celebration at 100%.
settings.dataBackupAnswer: Data is stored on device; use "Data Backup" screen for regular backups.
settings.languageChangeAnswer: Switch between Turkish/English via Settings > Language Selection.
settings.messagesPersonalAnswer: Messages become dynamic according to your mood and goal trends.
settings.wantToReportProblem: I want to report a problem.
settings.reportProblemAnswer: You can reach us from Settings > Help & Support section.
settings.diaryDescription: Touch "Write Today" on main page, note your feelings.
settings.dreamGoalDescription: Create new dream or goal from dreams screen.
settings.milestonesDescription: Percentage automatically increases as you complete subtasks within goals.
settings.notificationsDescription: Settings > Notifications: morning/evening, silent hours and summary.
settings.contactForSupport: Contact us for issues, suggestions or support.
settings.backupAndManageData: Back up and manage your data securely. All your diary entries,
settings.profileAndSettingsControlled: profile information and settings can be controlled from here.
settings.synchronizeTasksReminders: Synchronize tasks and reminders on your phone across all devices by moving them to the cloud.
settings.backupDiariesSecure: Securely back up your diaries and all your data to the Supabase cloud.
settings.restoreBackedUpData: Restore your backed-up data to your device.
settings.downloadPersonalDataJson: Download all your personal data in JSON format and store it elsewhere.
settings.deleteAllPersonalData: Delete all your personal data permanently. This operation cannot be undone!
settings.exportLocalData: Export data stored on this device to JSON format.
settings.importLocalData: Import data from previously exported JSON file.
settings.backupToSupabase: Back up all data to Supabase cloud storage.
settings.restoreFromSupabase: Restore your data from Supabase cloud backup.
settings.permanentlyDeleteAllData: Permanently delete all your data. This action cannot be undone!
settings.dataEncryptedStored: All your data is encrypted and stored on secure servers.
settings.dontForgetBackup: Don't forget to back up your data regularly.
settings.restoreDataWhenSwitching: Restore your data when switching to a new device.
